guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for meclizine and CYP2D6

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily D member 6

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166309563

text.html: "... when ANTIVERT® [meclizine] is administered to patients with CYP2D6 polymorphism, monitor for adverse reactions and clinical effect accordingly." See label for more information.

implications: "The genetic polymorphism of CYP2D6 that results in poor-, intermediate-, extensive-, and ultrarapid metabolizer phenotypes could contribute to large inter-individual variability in meclizine exposure."
